title: Explain a Billing Statement
description: A customer does not understand the charges on their most recent bill, which includes a policy change prorated amount.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and retrieve their latest billing statement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the statement in question.

tasks.description: Review the statement and the customer's recent policy changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees the customer recently added a new car, which triggered a prorated premium charge.

tasks.description: Clearly walk the customer through the statement, explaining each line item and how the prorated charge was calculated.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully explains the bill to the customer's satisfaction.
